title: Косметический ремонт
overview: The entertainment show "Cosmetic Repairs" (Russian: Косметический ремонт, romanized: Kosmeticheskiy remont) for the MUZ-TV channel is a Russian adaptation of the Endemol company's "Snog, Marry, Avoid" format.Any person in this world can be made into a model of style and harmonious beauty. Metalheads, punks, freaks, lovers of "making everything sparkle and shimmer" will undergo a thorough tuning of their own appearance and turn into real handsome men and beauties.The presenter of the show, Alexandra Rebenok, and the high-tech computer "POD" come to the aid of girls who are keen on "improving" their appearance. In a special "menu of changes", "POD" will offer you to choose options for hair color, hairstyle and style, and in accordance with them will select the most natural look.
